App Library.title: Vermillion
App Library.description: A realistic VR oil painting studio with tools, color mixing, and lifelike canvas textures.
App Library.educational: Great for art classes to explore painting techniques, color theory, and digital studio practice.

App Library.title: Open Brush
App Library.description: An open-source continuation of Google’s Tilt Brush, allowing 3D brush strokes in space.
App Library.educational: Useful for teaching spatial art, VR creativity, and immersive design projects.

App Library.title: Painting VR
App Library.description: A hands-on VR painting workshop with large-scale canvases and customizable tools.
App Library.educational: Allows students to practice painting techniques without materials or mess.

App Library.title: Kingspray Graffiti
App Library.description: A VR graffiti simulator with realistic spray paint effects and urban backdrops.
App Library.educational: Lets students explore street art safely while discussing art history, culture, and expression.

App Library.title: SculptrVR
App Library.description: A beginner-friendly VR sculpting and voxel modeling tool for creating 3D objects.
App Library.educational: Good for introducing students to 3D design, modeling concepts, and creative prototyping.

App Library.title: Gravity Sketch
App Library.description: A professional 3D design tool for sketching, modeling, and prototyping in VR.
App Library.educational: Excellent for design, architecture, and engineering students to collaborate on 3D projects.

App Library.title: ShapesXR
App Library.description: A collaborative VR prototyping tool for UI/UX and spatial design.
App Library.educational: Useful in computer science and design programs for testing user interfaces and team collaboration.

App Library.title: Arkio
App Library.description: A VR architectural design and planning tool with real-time collaboration.
App Library.educational: Architecture students can model buildings, test layouts, and visualize space in VR.

App Library.title: Figmin XR
App Library.description: A mixed reality creative app for building, animating, and interacting with 3D art.
App Library.educational: Encourages students to blend VR and AR by creating interactive MR projects.

App Library.title: Sketchfab Viewer (Browser)
App Library.description: An online platform to view and interact with 3D models directly in the Quest browser.
App Library.educational: Teachers can use 3D artifacts, models, and datasets across history, science, and art lessons.
App Library.notes: Use Quest browser; site account optional

App Library.title: Nanome
App Library.description: A molecular visualization and simulation workspace for exploring proteins, drugs, and materials in VR.
App Library.educational: Ideal for chemistry/biology courses to visualize molecular structures and discuss binding or interactions.

App Library.title: Sharecare YOU: Anatomy
App Library.description: A detailed human anatomy explorer with layered systems and guided lessons.
App Library.educational: Great for anatomy and physiology to examine organs, systems, and clinical context in 3D.

App Library.title: The Body VR: Journey Inside a Cell
App Library.description: A guided trip through the bloodstream and inside a human cell to see cellular processes up close.
App Library.educational: Use to introduce cell biology concepts and systems-level thinking with memorable visuals.

App Library.title: 3D Organon VR Anatomy (XR Premium)
App Library.description: A comprehensive VR anatomy atlas with labeled models, quizzes, and teaching tools.
App Library.educational: Supports anatomy labs, self-study, and instructor-led demonstrations with layered system views.

App Library.title: Mission: ISS
App Library.description: An interactive tour of the International Space Station with tasks and narrated segments.
App Library.educational: Great for space science and engineering—connects concepts to real-world habitats and systems.

App Library.title: Titans of Space PLUS
App Library.description: A guided tour of the solar system comparing planetary sizes, distances, and features.
App Library.educational: Perfect for astronomy lessons to reinforce scale, orbits, and planetary science concepts.

App Library.title: Apollo 11 VR
App Library.description: A cinematic VR recreation of the Apollo 11 mission from pre-launch to moon landing.
App Library.educational: Use in history and science to discuss the space race, teamwork, and engineering breakthroughs.

App Library.title: Ocean Rift
App Library.description: An underwater safari with diverse marine habitats and animal encounters.
App Library.educational: Supports biology/ecology lessons on biomes, adaptations, and conservation.

App Library.title: Blueplanet VR Explore
App Library.description: A collection of photogrammetry sites and landscapes from around the world.
App Library.educational: Great for geography, geology, and cultural studies; discuss terrain, history, and preservation.

App Library.title: Anne Frank House VR
App Library.description: A respectful VR tour of the Secret Annex with historical narration and context.
App Library.educational: Facilitates discussions on WWII, tolerance, and human rights with immersive perspective.

App Library.title: Wander
App Library.description: A Street View-style world explorer for visiting real locations in VR.
App Library.educational: Use for virtual field trips, place-based learning, and cultural geography.

App Library.title: Mondly: Languages in VR
App Library.description: Language learning scenarios with speech recognition and conversational practice.
App Library.educational: Supports ESL and language courses with immersive speaking and listening practice.

App Library.title: Immerse — Learn Languages in VR
App Library.description: Live instructor-led language sessions and social practice environments.
App Library.educational: Good for conversational fluency and cultural role-play activities in class.

App Library.title: ENGAGE XR
App Library.description: A virtual events and education platform for hosting classes, talks, and interactive lessons.
App Library.educational: Useful for remote lectures, guest speakers, and multi-class collaborations in VR.

App Library.title: Spatial
App Library.description: A social 3D platform for exhibits, events, and community spaces.
App Library.educational: Host student showcases, poster sessions, and interactive galleries.

App Library.title: Immersed
App Library.description: A virtual productivity workspace with multi-monitor streaming and team rooms.
App Library.educational: Great for focus sessions, research, and remote group work in quiet VR spaces.

App Library.title: TRIPP
App Library.description: Guided mindfulness and relaxation experiences with visuals and breath cues.
App Library.educational: Supports stress management, short wellness breaks, and mental health initiatives on campus.

Video Content.title: The People’s House: Inside the White House (Obama)
Video Content.description: A 360° guided look inside the White House with historical context.
Video Content.educational: Use in civics to discuss the executive branch, institutions, and public access to government spaces.
Video Content.notes: Works in YouTube VR on Quest

Video Content.title: Census in 360: Behind the Numbers
Video Content.description: Short 360° explainer on how census data is gathered and used.
Video Content.educational: Kick off lessons on demographics, surveys, and how data informs policy and funding.

Video Content.title: Supreme Court Building 360 Tour
Video Content.description: A 360° tour highlighting the architecture and function of the U.S. Supreme Court.
Video Content.educational: Supports discussions on judicial process, separation of powers, and court traditions.

Video Content.title: Smithsonian National Museum of American History 360
Video Content.description: A virtual walk-through of major exhibits at the National Museum of American History.
Video Content.educational: Great for primary sources, artifacts analysis, and American cultural history.

Video Content.title: Teotihuacan Pyramids 360
Video Content.description: A panoramic visit to the pyramids and avenues of Teotihuacan.
Video Content.educational: Use for Hispanic Heritage Month to discuss pre-Columbian civilizations and urban planning.

Video Content.title: Día de Muertos (Day of the Dead) 360
Video Content.description: Immersive 360° coverage of Day of the Dead altars, parades, and traditions.
Video Content.educational: Encourage cultural literacy and compare rituals across communities.

Video Content.title: Frida Kahlo Museum (Casa Azul) Virtual Tour
Video Content.description: A 360° look inside Frida Kahlo’s home and studio with featured works.
Video Content.educational: Pairs with art lessons on self-portraiture, symbolism, and historical context.

Video Content.title: Inside CERN (ATLAS) 360
Video Content.description: A 360° tour of the ATLAS experiment and CERN facilities.
Video Content.educational: Discuss large-scale science, instrumentation, and international collaboration.

Video Content.title: NASA: Journey Through the Solar System (Playlist)
Video Content.description: Curated NASA videos exploring planets, missions, and discoveries.
Video Content.educational: Supplement Titans of Space with mission footage and current science highlights.

Video Content.title: MIT.nano 360 Lab Tour
Video Content.description: A 360° tour of MIT.nano’s cleanroom and research spaces.
Video Content.educational: Start conversations on lab safety, ethics, and precision manufacturing.

Video Content.title: The Human Cell (360)
Video Content.description: A short 360° journey through cellular structures with narration.
Video Content.educational: Pairs with Body VR to reinforce organelles and cell function.

Video Content.title: Journey Into the Heart (360)
Video Content.description: A brief 360° exploration of the human heart’s chambers and blood flow.
Video Content.educational: Good for quick anatomy overviews or lab warm-ups.

Video Content.title: Operating Room 360 (Surgery Theater)
Video Content.description: A 360° view inside an operating room with staff and equipment.
Video Content.educational: Preview content to prepare students for sensitive or graphic material.

Video Content.title: Grand Canyon National Park 360
Video Content.description: Sweeping 360° vistas and geological features of the Grand Canyon.
Video Content.educational: Discuss erosion, time scales, and national park stewardship.

Video Content.title: Amazon Rainforest 360
Video Content.description: Immersive rainforest scenes highlighting biodiversity and biome features.
Video Content.educational: Compare ecosystems and discuss conservation and climate impacts.

Video Content.title: Himalayas / Everest Base Camp 360
Video Content.description: A 360° trek through high-altitude terrain and base camp culture.
Video Content.educational: Connect physical geography to human culture and expedition logistics.

Video Content.title: Traveling While Black (Meta TV)
Video Content.description: A powerful immersive documentary exploring the Green Book and travel while Black in America.
Video Content.educational: Prepare students for mature themes; use for empathy-building and historical context.

Video Content.title: The Displaced (NYT)
Video Content.description: Immersive reporting following children displaced by conflict.
Video Content.educational: Use to discuss migration, media literacy, and humanitarian issues.

Video Content.title: Clouds Over Sidra (UN/Within)
Video Content.description: A seminal 360° documentary inside a Syrian refugee camp.
Video Content.educational: Frame with context and reflective prompts about displacement and resilience.

Video Content.title: WWI/WWII Battlefield 360 Flyovers
Video Content.description: Aerial 360° tours of European battlefields and memorials.
Video Content.educational: Map battles, strategy, and historical geography using immersive visuals.

Video Content.title: The Louvre 360 Highlights
Video Content.description: A curated 360° look at iconic artworks and spaces in the Louvre.
Video Content.educational: Pairs with Open Brush/Gravity Sketch for 3D sketch studies and art analysis.
Video Content.notes: Use with Open Brush for 3D sketching

Video Content.title: VirtualSpeech: Presentation Practice (samples)
Video Content.description: Sample clips and scenarios from the VirtualSpeech platform.
Video Content.educational: Preview scenarios before booking full VR sessions; discuss delivery and body language.

Video Content.title: Space Explorers: The ISS Experience (trailers/playlist)
Video Content.description: High-production series snippets filmed in space aboard the ISS.
Video Content.educational: Use as a hook for space science units and to compare production vs. educational apps like Mission: ISS.

WebXR Content.title: Poly Pizza
WebXR Content.description: Explore and download stylized 3D models for use in XR and game development.
WebXR Content.educational: Students can search and incorporate free-to-use 3D assets into XR, game design, or digital art projects.

WebXR Content.title: Hubs by Mozilla
WebXR Content.description: Create shared 3D spaces for meetings, events, or educational walkthroughs — all in your browser.
WebXR Content.educational: Great for virtual classrooms, student collaboration, and presentations in immersive environments.

WebXR Content.title: Sketchfab
WebXR Content.description: Browse millions of interactive 3D models and view them in WebXR-enabled browsers.
WebXR Content.educational: Art and science instructors can use Sketchfab to embed and explore 3D structures and artworks.

WebXR Content.title: Access Mars
WebXR Content.description: Explore the surface of Mars using real imagery captured by NASA's Curiosity rover.
WebXR Content.educational: Perfect for astronomy and earth science classes to visualize planetary exploration.

WebXR Content.title: SculptGL
WebXR Content.description: Free browser-based 3D sculpting app — like a virtual clay studio.
WebXR Content.educational: Students can experiment with form and shape using virtual sculpting tools from any device.
